title: Manikyam & Pachi Kundan Kasu Mala Haaram with Matching Jhumkas
materials: Emerald (Pachi). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A breathtaking Kasu Mala Haaram featuring intricate floral diamond detailing interspersed with lustrous pearls. The centerpiece boasts a striking Ruby accent and a grand Emerald pendant set within a delicate diamond-studded openwork design. The matching Jhumkas showcase a miniature version of the floral design with a Ruby accent and pearl drop, echoing traditional temple jewelry motifs.
description: This exquisite Haaram and Jhumka set is a testament to timeless South Indian elegance. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, it embodies cultural heritage and modern sophistication. The combination of vibrant gemstones, sparkling diamonds, and lustrous pearls creates a mesmerizing effect. A true heirloom piece designed to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability.
